files.patch:
@@ -12,8 +12,23 @@ class ApiClient
   def initialize(base_url)
     @base_url = base_url
+    @timeout = 30
+    @retry_count = 3
   end
 
   def get(path)
-    HTTParty.get("#{@base_url}#{path}")
+    response = nil
+    @retry_count.times do |attempt|
+      begin
+        response = HTTParty.get(
+          "#{@base_url}#{path}",
+          timeout: @timeout
+        )
+        break
+      rescue Timeout::Error => e
+        raise e if attempt == @retry_count - 1
+        sleep(2 ** attempt)
+      end
+    end
+    response
   end
 end

@@ -1,15 +1,24 @@
 Rails.application.routes.draw do
-  namespace :api do
+  namespace :api, defaults: { format: :json } do
+    namespace :v1 do
       resources :pull_requests do
+        member do
+          get :diff
+          post :merge
+        end
       end
+    end
   end
 end
